content.content: Discussion forum for EIP-3569: Sealed NFT Metadata Standard by Sean Papanikolas.
content.GPT-summary: The post is a discussion forum for EIP-3569, a Sealed NFT Metadata Standard proposed by Sean Papanikolas. The author is explaining the proposal and asking for feedback, while third parties are asking questions, offering collaboration, and reviewing the proposal.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is asking for feedback
Author of proposal is explaining proposal
3rd party or author wants to collaborate on proposal
